history.proof: srun best use: existSys unfold: Formula, SysPrf, System, existH.

ctx: intros T f g v H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.tactic: apply sysExtend with (f := existH v f).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : System f, g : Formula v : nat H1 : ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T H2 : ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) H3 : SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T f) g Unable to unify "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNT) (_ : Prf LNT Axm (existH v f)), forall g : fol.Formula LNT, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) ?M1457 g" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNT) (_ : Prf LNT Axm g), forall g : fol.Formula LNT, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T (existH v f)) g".

ctx: intros T f g v H1 H2 H3.
intros T f g v H1 H2 H3.
intros T f g v H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: The reference Ensembles.Add_intro1 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros T f g v H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop H4 : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNT) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f f0 : nat -> fol.Formula LNT -> fol.Formula LNT T : System f, g : Formula v : nat H1 : In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> False H2 : In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> False x : fol.Formulas LNT x0 : Prf LNT x g H3 : forall g : fol.Formula LNT, In g x -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T f) g H0 : fol.Formula LNT Unable to unify "In ?M5247 (freeVarFormula ?M5243 ?M5246) -> False" with "fol.Term LNT".

original: intros T f g v H1 H2 H3. apply sysExtend with (f := existH v f). - intros a H4. unfold Ensembles.In in H4. apply Ensembles.Add_intro1. auto. - apply existSys; auto.
